title: Is it possible to convert an HD TV into a 3D TV? Is there any gadget that can do this? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can get a 2d to 3d hdmi converter. But usually they come with passive glasses (the red &blue type)  Amazon.com: IOGEAR 3D Complete+ 2D to 3D Converter (GHDSSW4): Electronics
Yes you can with Edison 3D box. Make any HDTV into a 3D tv with this box and it comes with active shutter glasses.(not red/blue)
